name: Femme
description:
a text based trans* femme dress-up party!

you wake up in your bedroom on a hot summer's day. seems like the perfect time for a fun, flirty, dress up party!

pick your perfect outfit and have fun!

This game has been designed for the 2020 Pride Game Jam. It has the trans* community at heart and has been written and designed by a non binary femme <3
